metadata.dc:author: Roldán, O V
Di Leo, L
metadata.dc:description: The importance of mounting cast on articulator during different stages of orthodontic treatments: diagnosis, treatment planning, case presentation and actual treatment, it is clearly defined. It is highlighted the paramount importance to have a precise occlusal concept to comparison with a clinical case.
metadata.dc:title: Montaje en articulador como rutina en el diagnóstico ortodóntico.
[Routine articulator mounting in orthodontic diagnosis].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Asociacion Odontologica Argentina
